metadata.title: CVE-2019-8782 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in iOS 13.2 and iPadOS 13.2, tvOS 13.2,Safari 13.0.3, iTunes for Windows 12.10.2, iCloud for Windows 11.0.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8782` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.26.1-3
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.26.1-3
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.26.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.26.1-3').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
